author: moors
title: DAO Based Travel Documents & IDs
description: Based on their place of birth, newborns are slated for either a powerful or disempowered passport.
solution: Bornstone DAO can be used to record births on the Cardano blockchain enabling the production of limitless Blockchain passports and visas.
experience: I take a human-centered, design-based approach to aid my community's growth through creativity, innovation and design.
